actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide additional humanitarian assistance authorizations for South Vietnam and Cambodia for the fiscal year 1975.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated to the President for the fiscal year 1975, to remain available until expended, $100,000,000 to provide humanitarian assistance to all people in need in South Vietnam and Cambodia. Stipulates that such assistance shall be provided under the auspices of and by the United Nations and its specialized agencies, or other international organization, or by arrangements with multilateral institutions and private voluntary agencies. Requires that, not later than six months after the date of enactment of this Act, the President shall transmit to the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Foreign Relations of the Senate: (1) the names of all agencies and organizations involved in the distribution of such assistance; (2) the means with which such distribution is carried out; and (3) the recipients of such assistance.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional humanitarian assistance authorizations for South Vietnam and Cambodia for the fiscal year 1975.
